duties_responsibilities.duty: Generate revenue by selling display advertising, audio formats, video formats, and content to grow advertising revenue.
Maintain and sustain relationships with media agencies and clients directly to deliver successful campaigns.
Educate and inspire clients to use the platform to support their marketing objectives using a data-driven approach.
Assess insights and data to make recommendations that drive repeat client revenue and establish the company as a consultative partner.
Attend and lead client meetings and entertainment to deepen client relationships as a trusted and valued partner.
Manage pipeline, revenue forecasts, and sales activity using Salesforce for maximum efficiency and visibility.
Establish a plan to achieve sales objectives and develop tactics for channel expansion.
Meet and exceed advertising revenue goals.
Attend weekly and monthly sales meetings as required.
